# Crafter's Curse (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, M (a broken tool)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 day/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 213

The target of *crafter’s curse* takes a –5 penalty on all [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill checks while the spell lasts.
